Pre-Game Insights: Scotland's head coach Steve Clarke said he'd instilled in his team the mantra'respect everyone and fear no one'
Scotland captain Andy Robertson said they hope to give supporters plenty to shout about and stay in Germany longer
Germany captain İlkay Gündoğan believes a convincing start could change the picture
Scotland has shown it can surprise in the past, beating Spain and Norway during the qualifying campaign
Germany is the clear favorite in the opener, hosting the match in Munich
Miscellaneous Highlights: Scottish fans are out in droves in the southern Germany city of Munich
There is hardly a German top or flag to be seen among Scottish supporters in Munich
24 teams from across Europe will play in a total of 51 matches before the final in Berlin on July 14
